A magic staff sculpted from Gray Shard to counter Tartanos.
It offers incredible power and mana at a great cost.

MATK +200, INT +6, VIT +6, LUK -6.
Healing skills effectiveness increased by 15%.
Magic attacks have a chance to restore HP and SP.
Consumes 100 HP every 10 seconds.
Consumes 1,000 HP when unequipped.

Class : ^777777Staff^000000
Attack  : ^777777100^000000
Weight : ^777777100^000000
Weapon Level : ^7777774^000000
Required Level : ^777777120^000000
Jobs : ^777777Mage and Acolyte Classes^000000

1680#
A One-Handed Staff emitting a red aura.
INT + 4, MATK + 70.
  
MATK increased by (refinement level * refinement level) up to a maximum upgrade level of 15.
If base level is 70 or above, MATK + 5 for every 10 base level.
  
Indestructible.

#
1847#
Knuckle used by an Ancient Hero.
It seems to have a different structure than the existing Knuckle, but it's specialized in overpowering the enemy at once. It seems to resonate with Ancient Hero Boots.
For every 2 refine level, ATK + 10.
For every 3 refine level, ranged physical damage power increased by 4%.
If refine level is +9 or above, [Rampage Blast] damage increases by 10%.
If refine level is +11 or above, [Rampage Blast] cooldown decreases by 1 second.
 
When equipped together with ^008080Ancient Hero Boots^000000 and attacking with physical attacks, with a fixed rate (3%) for 7s STR+20, ATK+ 15% .

Weight : ^777777100^000000

Jobs : ^777777Sura Classes^000000

#
7530#
[Amatsu the Land of Destiny]
The people of Amatsu carry themselves with honor and tranquility.
During your visit, you should see the Beautiful ^ff0000Water Shrine^000000.  The ^ff0000Lords of Amatsu^000000 are much more open
compared to rulers in other lands, and they will talk to visitors and citizens alike.   
The ^ff0000Legendary Tree^000000 in Amatsu has spawned many legends, including the legend that when you propose under 
its branches, your marriage will be blessed.   
While in Amatsu, you should also visit the ^ff0000Coy Pond^000000, as the nobility of Amatsu keep wonderful gardens of plants, sand and rocks. 
Their careful balance and flow is reflected in their garden arrangements, and the garden keeper's state of mind.  
Part of the magnificent gardens includes Coy Pond, where the frolicsome fish are a delight to all. 
(Don't forget to take photos of all these things, and show them to your Tour Guide.)				
#
7531#
[Kunlun The Hermit Land]				
Kunlun is a land in the clouds.  
Being so high in the air affords an unprecedented view of the world, and it also gives 
a different mindset to those who allow themselves to think freely.  
The ^ff0000Statue of Kunlun's Greatest Philosopher^000000 stands proudly in the middle of town, ready to
inspire great thought from all who gaze upon him.  All around Kunlun are spectacular ^ff0000Overlooks of the World^000000.  
But there are particular spots that are exceptionally breathtaking, please watch your step.
There is a ^ff0000small hill in Kunlun^000000 that is said to have been the Great Philosopher's favorite place for meditation; 
you should visit and see if any grand thoughts emerge from within.  
No matter how great a culture is, there will always be a few among its citizenry who just don't 'get it'. 
Those from Kunlun's history who thought small eventually shrank, and eventually disappeared.  
But before that time they had a ^ff0000Mini-town^000000 that they lived in under the ground beneath Kunlun.  
That place is an objective lesson against stagnant thinking.	
(Don't forget to take photos of all these things, and show them to your Tour Guide.)			
				
#
7532#
[Louyang]				
Louyang is a spiritual country, where the warrior spirit and clear thinking are highly prized. 
Such wondrous sites such as the ^ff0000Statue of the Man and the Tiger^000000 may inspire you to do your best.
Louyang has a different perspective on healing the mind and the body.  While Rune Midgard relies on the science of potions 
and Faith for healing, the Louyang healers practice their art at a '^ff0000Hospital^000000'.  
At a Hospital, your body will be cured by a system of body manipulations and changes in diet.  
The beautiful ^ff0000Palace^000000 that is protected by the Great Wall of Louyang is truly a sight to behold for every visitor.  
To go along with their proud heritage of Martial Arts and spiritual training, they often practice making their bodies 
more durable through exercise. Some of these exercises target the legs and lungs.  
Outside Louyang, some practice their ^ff0000Shouting on the Tower^000000.  When you have seen all these sites in Louyang,
you will have quite a few good memories to take home.
(Don't forget to take photos of all these things, and show them to your Tour Guide.)				
#
7533#
[Ayothaya]				
Thoughts of transcending your limitations, and finding Life's perfect philosophy, is Ayothaya's Heritage.  
In Ayothaya's history is a great Philosopher that all Ayothayans seek to emulate.  
There are numerous statues representing this Philosopher in and around Ayothaya.  
You should visit them to see what kind of significance these ^ff0000Reclining Philosopher Statues^000000 have for 	you.  
Part of the Philosophy involves many hours of meditation a day to maintain balance between the mind and body.  
You should visit the ^ff0000Shrine in Ayothaya^000000 and meditate upon your life's journey.  
And when you complete your regimen of Exercise and Introspection, you can refuel your body by visiting 
the ^ff0000Tom Yum Goon restaurant^000000.  The famous soup made here is truly delicious.  
Don't leave Ayothaya without sampling the dishes first.
(Don't forget to take photos of all these things, and show them to your Tour Guide.)

#
7588#
A very rare, almost non-existent, black ore.
^FFFFFF_^000000
Item Function:
Can be used to refine your Shadow Costume.
^FFFFFF_^000000
^800080[Refine Chance]^000000
+1 = 100 % ^009900(Safe)^000000
+2 = 100 % ^009900(Safe)^000000
+3 = 100 % ^009900(Safe)^000000
+4 = 100 % ^009900(Safe)^000000
+5 = 60% ^009900(Downgrade)^000000
+6 = 40% ^009900(Downgrade)^000000
+7 = 40% ^009900(Downgrade)^000000
+8 = 20% ^009900(Downgrade)^000000
+9 = 20% ^009900(Downgrade)^000000
+10 = 9% ^009900(Downgrade)^000000
^FFFFFF_^000000
^800080 [Notes]^000000
For refinement levels +5 to +10, 
item will not disappear if refinement fails, 
however refinement level will reduce by 1.
Example: Refinement from +4 to +5 fails,
refinement level will reduce from +4 to +3.
^FFFFFF_^000000
Item Type: Miscellaneous
Weight: 1

#
7730#
The Certificate received from ^0000FFNPC Swordsman^000000
--------------------
When you have collected The Newbie Ticket No. 1 - 7,
--------------------
Please give it to an NPC listed below in accordance with the Class you want to change to:
^FFFFFF_^000000
1. NPC Swordsman
	= Change to Swordsman
2. NPC Thief 
	= Change to Thief
3. NPC Archer 
	= Change to Archer
4. NPC Mage 
	= Change to Mage
5. NPC Acolyte 
	= Change to Acolyte
6. NPC Merchant 
	= Change to Merchant
--------------------
After you change a Job, 
the NPC will reward you with the following:
1. Instant Job Change
2. Novice Weapon
3. Rental Weapon [7 Days]
4. 1 Tiger Mask
5. 1 Guard
6. Yin Charm 1 ea
7. Yang Charm 1 ea
8. 1 C Frog Cap
9. 700 Red Potion
10. 300 Fly Wing
11. 30 Butterfly Wing
12. 50 Free Ticket for Kafra Storage
13. 50 Free Ticket for Kafra Transportation
Weight: ^7777771^000000
#

A clean convex mirror that can be used to detect the appearance of existing Boss Monsters on the map.
 If the Boss Monster exists, its location will be indicated on the mini map during the active duration of this item.
The effect has a 10 minute duration and is cancelled once the player leaves the map or logs out.
Lord of the Dead, Boss Monsters in the Bio Lab, Ktullanux, Memory of Thanatos, and 
some other event MVP monsters can not be detected by using this item.
Effect will be removed if character dies.^000000

16798#
Box Contents: 5 Convex Mirror Fragile!
^ffffff_^000000
A clean convex mirror that can be used to detect the location of existing Boss Monsters on the map.
 If the Boss Monster exists, its location will be indicated on the mini map during the effect duration of this item.
The effect has a 10 minute duration, but it will also end if the player leaves the map or logs out.
Lord of the Dead, boss monsters in the Bio Lab, Ktullanux, Memory of Thanatos and some other event MVP monsters can not be detected using this item.
^ffffff_^000000
Weight: ^7777771^000000

18164#
An ancient hero's bow from the forgotten royal family.
It looks old, but it has hidden magic, and it seems to resonate with Ancient Hero Boots.
For every 2 refine level, ATK +10.
For every 3 refine level, [Arrow Storm] damage increased by 12%.
If refine level is +9 or above, attack speed increased (delay after attack decreased by 10%).
If refine level is +11 or above, ranged physical damage increased by 5%.
 
When equipped together with ^008080Ancient Hero Boots^000000 and attacking with physical attacks, with a fixed rate(3%) for 7s DEX + 20, bow damage power increased by 20%.

18652#
A helmet designed after the God Biter: Fenrir who is also known as Vanargandr.
 
If refine level is +4 and below : 
Has 1% chance to absorb 1% of physical damage dealt to enemy as HP.
Has 1% chance to absorb 1% of physical damage dealt to enemy as SP.
 
If refine level is +5 to +6 : 
Has 1% chance to absorb 3% of physical damage dealt to enemy as HP.
Has 1% chance to absorb 1% of physical damage dealt to enemy as SP.
 
If refine level is +7 : 
Has 3% chance to absorb 5% of physical damage dealt to enemy as HP.
Has 1% chance to absorb 2% of physical damage dealt to enemy as SP.
 
If refine level is +8 : 
Has 5% chance to absorb 5% of physical damage dealt to enemy as HP.
Has 1% chance to absorb 2% of physical damage dealt to enemy as SP.
 
If refine level is +9 and above : 
Has 6% chance to absorb 8% of physical damage dealt to enemy as HP.
Has 2% chance to absorb 4% of physical damage dealt to enemy as SP.

^ff0000The item can't be exchanged with the other one^000000
This well-written manual explains how to fight effectively
^000088EXP rate increases by 100% for 30 minutes^000000

Cooldown will reduce only when the player is online.
^ff0000Warning : The item effect does not stack up with the other Battle Manual^000000
Weight: ^7777771^000000

23539#
A life insurance certificate issued by Kafra Center. If the character dies within 30 minutes after using this item, 
there will be no EXP loss penalty and the effect will disappear after your first KO'.
The item can be used again after 2 hours and 30 minutes.
Cooldown will reduce only when the player is online.
Weight: ^7777771^000000

If refine level is +9 or above, increase physical and magic damage to medium size enemies by an additional 2%.
 
Equip with ^32CD32Medium Shadow Weapon^000000 and ^32CD32Medium Shadow Armor^000000, Max HP + 1%, Max SP + 1%.

If total refine level is +20, immune to Blind.

If total refine level is +30, immune to Frozen.

If total refine level is +30, immune to Stun.

If total refine level is +20, immune to Curse.

Increases experience gained from monsters by 1% per 2 refine levels.

Set Bonus
Rookies's Shadow Shield
Rookies's Shadow Shoes
Increases experience gained from monsters by 5%.
Increases experience gained from monsters by an additional 5% if the sum of refine level is 15 or higher.

Class : ^777777Shadow Equipment^000000
Position : ^777777Shield^000000 Weight : ^7777770^000000
Required Level : ^77777750^000000
Maximum Level : ^77777799^000000
Job : ^777777All Jobs^000000

24214#
Shoes worn on top of normal shoes for additional DEF. Can be equipped alone but needs a set to have any effect.
For every 3 refine level, increase EXP gain from monsters by 1%.
Equip with Advanced Shadow Shoes and Advanced Shadow Shield, increase EXP gain from monsters by 2%.
If total refine level is +15, increase EXP gain from monsters by 2%.

A strength ring given to veteran members of Eden Group. 
ATK +5%.
When equipped with Awakened Eden Group Necklace of Strength , Awakened Eden Group Boots ,
Reduces after-attack delay by 10%, Hit +10, experience gained +2%.
When equipped with Awakened Eden Group Necklace of Strength , Awakened Eden Group Uniform ,
ATK +50, reduces damage taken from all element attacks except neutral +5%, experience gained +2%.
Class: ^777777Accessory^000000 Defense: ^7777770^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required Level: ^777777145^000000
Job: ^777777All jobs^000000
